MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA1 postcode area of Woolston, Warrington affecting properties in Dam Lane, Hillock Lane, Poulton Crescent  and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:40AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate a suspected blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:45AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:17AM on 23rd October 2020
